cat_scritch: Under the chin and between the ears
cat_personality1: Danger is a fiery boy who loves playing chase and hide and seek
cat_personality2: He has a bit of an ego though so it's best to let him win to avoid a sulky puss (nothing a scratch under the chin won't fix!)

cat_scritch: Top of her head and base of her tail
cat_toy: Laser pointer and her jingly strawberry
cat_personality1: Fran is a polite and bougie lady that let's her wild side out at the site of a laser pointer!
cat_personality2: As much as she loves to play Fran will just as happily perch close by and allow you to adore her

cat_personality1: Spock is one energetic lady! She loves chasing and attacking anything you can dangle on the end of a string
cat_personality2: If all the chasing tires you out she'll let you rest if you play a game of fetch

cat_scritch: Under the chin and the belly
cat_personality1: Smokey is a gentle giant. He may look boistrous when it's playtime but just loves a cuddle!
cat_personality2: You'll have a hard time saying no to this guy. He has somehow mastered the kitty version of puppy eyes
